Filter contacts by authors. Use the <kbd: Filter contacts by authors. Use the <kbd>shift</kbd> or <kbd>ctrl/cmd</kbd> key to select multiple authors. Set the logical operator to match or not match the selected authors.
Filter contacts by categories. Use the <: Filter contacts by categories. Use the <kbd>shift</kbd> or <kbd>ctrl/cmd</kbd> key to select multiple categories. Set the logical operator to match or not match the selected categories.

Filter contacts by tags. Use the <kbd>sh: Filter contacts by tags. Use the <kbd>shift</kbd> or <kbd>ctrl/cmd</kbd> key to select multiple tags. Set the logical operator to match at least one of the tags, none of the tags or all tags.
